snippet: Two-time major champion Stan Wawrinka pulled out of the Olympics on Tuesday because of injury, leaving the Rio Games without half of the men ranked in the ATP's top 10....
lead_paragraph: Two-time major champion Stan Wawrinka pulled out of the Olympics on Tuesday because of injury, leaving the Rio Games without half of the men ranked in the ATP's top 10.

headline.print_headline: Switzerland's Stan Wawrinka Pulls Out of Rio Olympics
headline.main: Switzerland's Stan Wawrinka Pulls Out of Rio Olympics
